name: Avocado Toast with Grilled Cheese
author: Charles Wees
summary: Avocado toast is simply delicious for a quick lunch.
ingredients: 2 large avocados - peeled, pitted, and mashed
2 tablespoons chopped fresh cilantro, or more to taste
¼ cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese, or to taste
directions: Set an oven rack about 6 inches from the heat source and preheat the oven's broiler
Place bread slices on a baking sheet under the preheated broiler until toasted, 1 to 2 minutes
Mix together mashed avocados, red onion, and cilantro in a bowl
Spread on toasted bread and sprinkle with Parmesan cheese
Return to broiler until cheese is melted, 2 to 3 minutes
